CONNECT.FACEBOOK_MESSAGE: If you have been a PayJoy customer, please log in with the same Facebook account that you have used for prior loans.
CONNECT.ONBOARDING_DISABLED: Onboarding is temporarily disabled.  Please come back later.
CONNECT.INSTANT_APPROVAL_TITLE: Our loans are instant and easy
CONNECT.INSTANT_APPROVAL_SUBTITLE: Qualify for loans of $1,000 - $5,000 MXN within minutes and choose one that works for you.
CONNECT.INSTANT_APPROVAL_SUBTITLE_EC: Qualify for loans of 50 USD - 250 USD within minutes and choose one that works for you.
CONNECT.ACCESS_SUBTITLE: Pick up your cash at any BBVA-- no bank account needed. Or have the funds transferred to your bank account.
CONNECT.ACCESS_SUBTITLE_EC: Pick up your cash at any Western Union point nationwide to withdraw your money
CONNECT.ESTABLISH_CREDIT_SUBTITLE: Early in your credit history?  We understand. Using our PayJoy Lock, we make you eligible for more loans by turning your phone into collateral.
CONNECT.LOCK_TITLE: Use the PayJoy lock as your promise to us
CONNECT.LOCK_SUBTITLE_1: We will never charge you interest for being late. If you're late on a payment your phone will have restricted functions.  You can always make emergency calls, but most other functions will be blocked.
CONNECT.LOCK_SUBTITLE_2: As soon as you make a payment, your phone will restore to normal functions.
CONNECT.EXPLAIN_1_HEADER: Provide information to qualify for offers
CONNECT.EXPLAIN_1_SUBHEADER: Get ready with your phone number, ID and to take a selfie
CONNECT.EXPLAIN_1_SUBHEADER_EC: Get ready with your phone number, ID, and to take a selfie.
CONNECT.EXPLAIN_2_HEADER: Choose a loan offer that suits you best

BUTTON.DATA_NEED_FIXED: I want to report incorrect information

MESSAGE.WAIT_SUBTITLE_ID_EC: The ID verification process may take a few moments. Thank you for your patience.
MESSAGE.WAIT_SUBTITLE_SELFIE: The selfie verification process may take a few moments. Thank you for your patience.

MESSAGE.DAILY_QUOTA_BODY: Please come back tomorrow to apply for a loan.
MESSAGE.ALREADY_LOAN_TITLE: It looks like you already have a loan with PayJoy
MESSAGE.ALREADY_LOAN_BODY: Please pay off your current loan with PayJoy first.
MESSAGE.DECLINED_TITLE: We’re sorry, you’re not qualified for a loan at this time.
MESSAGE.UNSUPPORTED_MARKET_TITLE: We're sorry.  We are not offering cash loans in your country yet.
MESSAGE.UNSUPPORTED_MARKET_BODY: Please stay tuned.  We hope to expand our offerings to more countries soon.
MESSAGE.ERROR_TITLE: We're sorry, we've encountered an error:
MESSAGE.ERROR_HELP: Please contact customer support and provide the error code above.
MESSAGE.DEVICES_UNAVAILABLE_TITLE: Sorry, we cannot access our list of compatible devices
MESSAGE.NO_INTERNET_BODY: Please check your internet connection and try again.

HELP.TOOLTIP: You are just a click away from personalized help from our team. We are always here to help.
HELP.RECEIVING_MONEY_CONTENT: Puedes elegir la opción de retiro sin tarjeta en cualquier cajero automático BBVA o por transferencia bancaria.
HELP.RECEIVING_MONEY_CONTENT_EC: Puedes acercarte a cualquier punto de Western Union con tu cédula de identidad Ecuatoriana para retirar el dinero
HELP.ATM_WITHDRAWAL_TITLE: ¿Cómo funciona el retiro en cajero automático?
HELP.ATM_WITHDRAWAL_CONTENT: Una vez que has recibido el mensaje de texto de BBVA con tu código de 12 digitos, puedes acudir a cualquier cajero automatico BBVA y combinar el código de los 12 dígitos con el PIN de 4 dígitos que se muestra en la aplicación.
HELP.BANK_TRANSFER_CONTENT: Si eliges la opción de recibir tu dinero por transferencia bancaria, deberás proporcionarnos tu CLABE interbancaria. Tu dinero se verá reflejado en tu cuenta en unas horas. Si completaste tu solicitud después de las 5 pm, en fin de semana o día feriado, la transferencia se hará el siguiente día hábil.
HELP.MAKING_PAYMENTS_CONTENT: Puedes dirigirte a la sección de pagos y usar una de las diferentes opciones. Podrás escoger entre hacer pagos en Oxxo o tiendas de conveniencia como: 7-Eleven, Walmart, Bodega Aurrera, Superama, etc.
HELP.MAKING_PAYMENTS_CONTENT_EC: Puedes realizar tu pago en cualquier de nuestras tiendas autorizadas
HELP.MISSED_PAYMENT_TITLE: ¿Qué pasa si no se realiza un pago?
HELP.MISSED_PAYMENT_CONTENT: Si no realizas un pago a tiempo no cobramos intereses moratorios, tu equipo tendrá funciones restringidas por la aplicación de PayJoy hasta que realices tu pago.
HELP.BUILD_CREDIT_CONTENT: PayJoy reporta tus pagos a buró de crédito lo cual te ayuda a construir tu historial.Si no cuentas con historial crediticio, PayJoy creará uno cuando comencemos a reportar tu buen historial de pago.
HELP.OUR_MISSION_CONTENT: PayJoy fue fundada en 2015 con el objetivo de dar acceso a créditos en efectivo y financiamiento para smartphones a personas en mercados emergentes alrededor del mundo. Hemos levantado más de 40 Millones de Dólares a través de reconocidas empresas de Venture Capital, incluyendo a Union Square Ventures y Greylock Partners. Atendemos a clientes en Estados Unidos, India, Indonesia, México y Sudáfrica
HELP.CREDIT_TERMS_TITLE: Términos y condiciones de tu crédito
HELP.WHY_DATA_CONTENT: PayJoy necesita acceso a estos datos para evaluar el crédito de forma precisa, verificar la información del cliente, y operar como una app segura en tu dispositivo.
HELP.HOW_PROTECT_CONTENT: Tus datos son protegidos usando encriptación estándar en la industria y controles de seguridad.
HELP.FEEDBACK_FORM: What do you like? What needs improvement?
HELP.FEEDBACK_FORM_SUBTITLE: At PayJoy, we care about each of our customers. Please feel free to provide feedback  or connect with us directly through the WhatsApp link below.
HELP.FEEDBACK_SUBTITLE_1: We would love to hear from you
HELP.FEEDBACK_SUBTITLE_2: What do you like? What needs improvement? Share with us!
HELP.TELL_US: Tell us what you think. Your feedback is appreciated.
HELP.CONTACT_SUBTITLE: ¡Estamos aquí para ayudarte! Por favor revisa nuestra sección de preguntas frecuentes aquí.
HELP.NOT_QUALIFIED_TITLE: Algunas de las razones más comunes para no ser elegible para el préstamo son:
HELP.NOT_QUALIFIED_CONTENT:
- Ser menor de 18 años
- La identificación no es valida.
- La selfie no coincide con la foto de la identificación.
- Tener un crédito activo con PayJoy.
- Haber tenido un mal historial de pago en tu crédito anterior con PayJoy.
- No han pasado 15 días naturales entre tu crédito anterior con PayJoy y uno neuvo.
- Basado en algorítmo de riesgo, no has sido aprobado. Puedes intentar de nuevo en un futuro.
HELP.PHONE_PERMISSIONS_TITLE: Why do we need these permissions?
HELP.PHONE_PERMISSIONS_CONTENT:
PayJoy takes user privacy very seriously.

The PayJoy Cash App uses Read_SMS permissions handling as a method to verify the account and loan eligibility of its costumers.

PayJoy also uses these permissions for account verification. This ensures that loan applicants get the best possible offer and the lowest possible rates.
HELP.ID_SELFIE_TITLE: ¿Para qué usa PayJoy mi identificación y mi selfie?
HELP.ID_SELFIE_CONTENT:
PayJoy te pide una foto de tu identificación oficial y una foto de tu rostro para protegerte de fraudes y crear tu cuenta de usuario.

Además, usamos la información de tu identificación para completar tu perfil y ahorrarte tiempo.
HELP.LOCK_PHONE_TITLE: ¿Qué pasa cuando mi celular se bloquea por falta de pago?
HELP.LOCK_PHONE_CONTENT:
Sólo tendrás acceso a:

- Llamar y recibir llamadas de emergencia
- Llamar al número de soporte de PayJoy
- Utilizar la aplicación PayJoy
- Accesar a los ajustes
- Conectar a internet y WiFi

Las funciones normales del celular como enviar y recibir mensajes de texto, utilizar la cámara, accesar a las fotos, entrar a aplicaciones como WhatsApp, Instagram, YouTube, Facebook, recibir y realizar llamadas estarán bloqueadas.
Al momento de realizar tu pago, el equipo será desbloqueado por completo, liberando cualquier acción antes restringida.
HELP.PRIVACY_POLICY_CONTENT:
Mediante el presente Aviso de Privacidad, usted tiene la oportunidad de escoger los productos y servicios que le ofrecemos, sabiendo que sus datos personales estarán protegidos. La seguridad de su información personal es nuestra prioridad; es por ello que protegemos esta información mediante el mantenimiento de protecciones físicas, electrónicas y de procedimiento, capacitando a nuestros empleados en el manejo adecuado de su información personal, a fin de impedir que terceros no autorizados accedan a la misma.

El responsable del tratamiento de sus datos personales será PayJoy, que recabará sus datos para atender su solicitud de un producto o servicios de PayJoy, o bien, para formalizar la celebración de cualquier producto o servicio.

Podemos revisar este Aviso de Privacidad en cualquier momento, y el uso de un producto o servicios después de dicha revisión constituye su aceptación del nuevo Aviso de Privacidad.

PRIVACY.PREFACE: Upon having an active loan with PayJoy our application requests permissions and controls from your phone to function correctly.
PRIVACY.WHY_WE_NEED_SECTION_TITLE: What do we ask for and why?
PRIVACY.WHY_WE_NEED: What do we ask for and why
PRIVACY.READ_CONTACTS: Determine loan eligibility and pricing in order to make a personalized offer for you and prevent fraud.
PRIVACY.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: It’s needed for saving updates from our app.
PRIVACY.INTERNET_ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE: Verify internet connection and allow you to communicate with our server in a safe way.
PRIVACY.FOREGROUND_SERVICE: It adds our app as a foreground service to provide a proper functioning.
PRIVACY.READ_PHONE_STATE: Verify SIM card and phone number.
PRIVACY.RECEIVE_SMS_1: Read incoming text messages only to help you unblock the phone in case it’s not connected to internet.
PRIVACY.RECEIVE_SMS_2: PayJoy also collects information about installed apps in order to detect possible fraud and prevent it.
PRIVACY.RECEIVE_SMS_3: Once PayJoy lock is activated, PayJoy will ask you for permission to read SMS messages and contacts with the only purpose of providing you with personalized loan offers.
PRIVACY.RECEIVE_SMS_4: Not authorizing permissions won’t change the loan term nor the phone functionality.

LOCK_INFO.PAY_ON_TIME: If you pay on time, the lock will never engage
LOCK_INFO.LATE_PAYMENT_RESTRICTION: If you are late on a payment, the lock will engage and your phone will have restricted functionalities
LOCK_INFO.RESTRICTED_CALLING: You will only be able to call emergency numbers or numbers whitelisted by your loan provider
LOCK_INFO.RESTORE_TO_NORMAL: As soon as you make your payment, your phone will restore to normal functions

ID_PHOTOS.JUST_ID_EC: Remember that only your ID should be seen in the photo.

ID_PHOTOS.CHECK_FACE_ON_ID: Make sure your picture shows a face on the ID.

SELFIE.CHECK_IMAGE_QUALITY: Make sure your face is clearly visible on the picture. Please make sure your picture is not blurry or contain any glare.

CIRCULO.CONTRACT_BODY_1: Por este conducto autorizo expresamente a PayJoy y sus socios prestamistas para que por conducto de sus funcionarios facultados lleve a cabo investigaciones, sobre mi comportamiento Crediticio en las Sociedades de Información Crediticia que estime conveniente.
CIRCULO.CONTRACT_BODY_2: Así mismo, declaro que conozco la naturaleza y alcance de la información que se solicitará, del uso que PayJoy y sus socios prestamistas hará de tal información y de que esta podrá realizar consultas periódicas de mi historial crediticio, consintiendo que esta autorización se encuentre vigente por un periodo de 3 años contados a partir de la fecha de su expedición y en todo caso durante el tiempo que mantengamos relación jurídica.
CIRCULO.CONTRACT_BODY_3: Estoy consciente y acepto que este documento quede bajo propiedad de (Nombre de Usuario) y/o Sociedad de Información Crediticia Consultada para efectos de control y cumplimiento del artículo 28 de la Ley para Regular a Las Sociedades de Información Crediticia.
CIRCULO.CANCEL_EXPLAIN: We cannot continue the process without permissions.
CIRCULO.LEAVE_APP: I want to leave the app

WITHDRAWAL.HEADER: When you pick up your cash
WITHDRAWAL.SUBHEADER: Bring the following when you collect your money at the BBVA window:
WITHDRAWAL.SUBHEADER_EC: Bring the following when you collect your money at Western Union:

WALMART.CONGRATULATIONS: Congratulations! Your gift card is almost ready.

STORE_PICKUP.HEADER: Follow these steps to pick it up in store:
STORE_PICKUP.STEP_ONE: Look for a PayJoy promoter in a Bodega Aurrerá store
STORE_PICKUP.STEP_TWO: Click “Next” and show the promoter your screen
STORE_PICKUP.STEP_THREE: Get your gift card, ready for immediate use!

WALMART.USAGE: Use your gift card at any Bodega Aurrera, Walmart or Sam's Club store.

LOAN_OPTIONS.TITLE: How would you like to receive your money?
LOAN_OPTIONS.ATM_WITHDRAWAL: Withdrawal without a card at a BBVA ATM

FINAL_OFFER.LOCK_DETAILS_CONTENT: This loan will be secured by the PayJoy padlock. This means that when you are late on a payment, your phone will be locked and have limited features until you make your payment.
FINAL_OFFER.ATM_WITHDRAWAL_CONTENT: Once you have received the text message from BBVA with your 12-digit code, you can go to any BBVA ATM and combine the 12-digit code with the 4-digit PIN displayed in the app.
FINAL_OFFER.WINDOW_PICKUP_CONTENT: Once your loan is approved, your money will be available at the BBVA bank within 4-8 business hours. You will be able to consult from your application the information that you must present at the window to withdraw your money.
FINAL_OFFER.WINDOW_PICKUP_CONTENT_EC: Once your loan is approved, your money will be available at any Western Union location within 4-8 business hours. You must attend with your identity card and request the withdrawal.
FINAL_OFFER.CASH_TRANSFER_CONTENT: Your money will be reflected in your account in a few hours. If you completed your request after 5 pm, on a weekend or a holiday, the transfer will be made the next business day.
FINAL_OFFER.PAYMENT_CONTENT: You can go to the payment section and use one of the different options. You can choose between making payments at Oxxo or convenience stores such as: 7-Eleven, Walmart, Bodega Aurrera, and Superama.

WINDOW_PICKUP.CONTENT: Once your loan is approved, your money will be available at the BBVA bank within 4-8 business hours. You must go with your current official identification, agreement number, reference and amount (loan amount). You can check this in your application.
WINDOW_PICKUP.CONTENT_EC: Once your loan is approved, your money will be available at any Western Union module. You must bring your identity card to request the withdrawal.
WINDOW_PICKUP.HOURS: BBVA service hours are Monday through Friday (8:30 am - 4:00 pm).
WINDOW_PICKUP.HOURS_EC: Western Union support hours are Monday through Friday from 9 am to 7 pm.
WINDOW_PICKUP.VALID: *Remember that your reference will be valid for 5 business days.
WINDOW_PICKUP.BUTTON_TEXT: Yes, withdraw my money from BBVA
